column4: I have a question I am trying to install ubuntu 8.10 on a asus m2a-vm and when i install it just prompts at initramfs and im not sure whats up. I google searched it and tried to play around with bios settings and some other stuff to no avail. Anyone got any advice?
it seems it can't mount root
which means grub has not been installed right
what's the last message you see ?
